_meanings: {@--2@} To bear up, raise up, elevate.

{@--4@} To suffer, 
experience, feel; <ls>Māl. 6. 9</ls>;  
{#svAmyarTamudvahan#} <ls>Mu. 2. 21</ls> adhering to his
master's cause.

{@--7@} To
lead to termination, finish;  
{#prArabDamuttamajanAstvamivodvahaMti#} <ls>Mu. 2. 17</ls>
<ab>v. l.</ab>
